items.details: Ensure your dog is in good hands while you're on-the-go with this convenient half-day care option.
Whether you're at work, out and about, or simply have a packed schedule, this full day option is a life-saver for busy dog mums and dads.
Ensure round-the-clock care for your dog when you're out late or away for the night. This rate applies to all bookings that run past the 6 pm cut-off point for daycare rates.
With a reduced rate for longer bookings, you can rest assured that Lau's Paws will be the ideal home away from home for your dog no matter how long you're away for.

items.service: Bank Holidays and New Year's Eve
items.details: Whichever service you need, rates for these special dates incur an extra charge.

items.service: Christmas Day and New Year's Day
items.details: On the 25th of December and the 1st of January, Lau's Paws reserves the right to charge twice the usual rate, whether for daycare or overnight boarding.
Bookings for two or more dogs from the same household are entitled to a 20% discount on the usual daycare and overnight rates.
